00058         byte    data[256];

00065         byte    read_sz;

00118 class DLLDIR CCplSerialCRC : public CCplSerial {
00119 
00120 protected:
00121         virtual bool load_tbl();                                        
00122         virtual void defineProtocol(byte _kataddr);     
00123         virtual void send(byte* send_buf, byte write_sz, short retries = 3); // Sends a packet.
00124         virtual void recv(byte* read_buf, byte read_sz, byte* size); // Receives the packet and checks the CRC.
00125 
00126 public:
00131         virtual bool init(CCdlBase* _device, byte _kataddr = 24);
00132 
00137         virtual void comm(const byte* pack, byte* buf, byte* size);
00138 
00143         virtual void getMasterFirmware(short* fw, short* rev);
00144 
00145 };
